page.title: 10 - HOUSING (2)
page.content:
There is some council housing, but they tend to be occupied by older or retired people. Young couples have to join a long waiting list for a council house, and usually have to leave the area. The private girls' school at St. Michael's, Burton Park, has built houses for its own staff. An old stable block was converted into sixth form study bedrooms. This area is administered by West Sussex County Council and Chichester District Council. Duncton has a parish council, with seven councillors.
The three shops in the area consist of a builders merchant at Heathend Sandpit, a motor accessory and sweet shop at Heathend garage and the Granary (china and furniture) at Coultershaw.
